text: Manuel Perez Luna (born April 1, 1966 in MÃ¡laga) is a wheelchair basketball athlete from Spain. He has a physical disability: he is a 2 point wheelchair basketball player. He played wheelchair basketball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. They beat the United States 66-60 to finish third. == References == Category:Living people Category:1966 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Spanish wheelchair basketball players Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2 point player Category:People from Malaga
